post.description: Allows users to create an account.
Allows users to log in using email and password.
Logs out a user by invalidating the refresh token.
Allows users to refresh their access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name or email

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort users by a specific field (e.g., name:asc)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users per page

post.description: Only admins can create new users.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users with optional filters and pagination.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name, email, or username

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort users by a specific field and direction (e.g., name:asc, role:desc)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users per page

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

get.summary: Get details of the currently authenticated user

apiKeyAuth.name: X-API-KEY
apiKeyAuth.description: API key needed to authorize requests
